/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees, providing a stark contrast to the clear blue sky above. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades hinting at the architectural diversity of the city. Cars of different makes and models are scattered along the road, adding to the dynamic nature of the scene. The sun shines brightly, casting long shadows and illuminating the scene with a warm glow. The image is taken from a low angle, which emphasizes the height of the buildings and the expanse of the sky.
